Title: The Burglary
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Brendan McCarthy, David Budin, David Budin (executive story editor), Brendan McCarthy (executive story editor)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: After they're robbed, Frankie is rattled, but Grace has a secret. With Robert in rehearsals and making new friends, Sol feels left out.
